ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Item 1: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you disclose or tell facts and information to your spouse/partner?
Item 2: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you disclose or tell your thoughts to your spouse/partner?
Item 3: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you disclose or tell your feelings to your spouse/partner?
Item 4: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did your spouse/partner disclose or tell you facts and information?
Item 5: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did your spouse/partner disclose or tell you their thoughts?
Item 6: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did your spouse/partner disclose or tell their feelings to you?
Item 7: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you feel understood by your spouse/partner?
Item 8: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you feel validated by your spouse/partner?
Item 9: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you feel accepted by your spouse/partner?
Item 10: In the past 24 hours, to what extent did you feel cared for by your spouse/partner?
Item 11: In the past 24 hours, rate the amount of closeness that you experienced with your spouse/partner?
Item 12: In the past 24 hours, did your spouse/partner give you needed advice about something?
Item 13: In the past 24 hours, did your spouse/partner give their viewpoint on a problem that you were experiencing?
Item 14: In the past 24 hours, did your spouse/partner do something to help you solve a problem?
Item 15: In the past 24 hours, did your spouse/partner express care and concern for you?
Item 16: In the past 24 hours, did your spouse/partner listen to your personal feelings and thoughts?
Item 17: In the past 24 hours, did your spouse/partner compliment you or tell you that you did something well?
Item 18: In the past 24 hours, overall, how much support did your spouse/partner give you?
